snippet.title: Dear RED [Official Trailer]
snippet.description:
Red had grown, she understood what happened, why he always mentioned those words although she couldn't stand watching and being overwhelmed by the old memories all the time. Now that he's dead, it doesn't have to be so anymore... 

►Buy the Extended version on Steam:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/453850/
►Play Dear RED on Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dearred.leesang
Download Dear RED on RMN: http://goo.gl/REeYJP
